languages.text: "Таковы последствия необдуманных решений, продиктованных нехваткой веры в законы Бога-Императора! Я готова лично положить конец бесчинствам проклятого ксеноса и воздать ему за каждую утраченную жизнь!"

traits.locale_text: "Таковы последствия необдуманных решений, продиктованных нехваткой веры в законы Бога-Императора! Я готова лично положить конец бесчинствам проклятого ксеноса и воздать ему за каждую утраченную жизнь!"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Such are the consequences of ill-considered actions born out of the lack of faith in the God-Emperor's laws! I am ready to stop the accursed xenos's rampage personally and repay every life he has taken!"
languages.original_text: "Таковы последствия необдуманных решений, продиктованных нехваткой веры в законы Бога-Императора! Я готова лично положить конец бесчинствам проклятого ксеноса и воздать ему за каждую утраченную жизнь!"

traits.locale_text: "Such are the consequences of ill-considered actions born out of the lack of faith in the God-Emperor's laws! I am ready to stop the accursed xenos's rampage personally and repay every life he has taken!"

traits.locale_text: "Such are the consequences of ill-considered actions born out of the lack of faith in the God-Emperor's laws! I am ready to stop the accursed xenos's rampage personally and repay every life he has taken!"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: “不相信神皇的律法草率行事，最终就会产生这样的后果！我已经准备好亲自面对那个该死的异形了！他要为他杀害的每一个人付出代价！”
languages.original_text: "Such are the consequences of ill-considered actions born out of the lack of faith in the God-Emperor's laws! I am ready to stop the accursed xenos's rampage personally and repay every life he has taken!"

traits.locale_text: “不相信神皇的律法草率行事，最终就会产生这样的后果！我已经准备好亲自面对那个该死的异形了！他要为他杀害的每一个人付出代价！”
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: « Ce sont là les conséquences d'actions irréfléchies nées d'un manque de foi dans les préceptes de l'Empereur-Dieu ! Je suis prête à mettre moi-même un terme aux agissements de ce maudit xénos et à venger toutes les vies qu'il a prises ! »
languages.original_text: "Such are the consequences of ill-considered actions born out of the lack of faith in the God-Emperor's laws! I am ready to stop the accursed xenos's rampage personally and repay every life he has taken!"

traits.locale_text: « Ce sont là les conséquences d'actions irréfléchies nées d'un manque de foi dans les préceptes de l'Empereur-Dieu ! Je suis prête à mettre moi-même un terme aux agissements de ce maudit xénos et à venger toutes les vies qu'il a prises ! »
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: «¡Eso es por tomar decisiones apresuradas desconsiderando las leyes del Dios Emperador! ¡Yo misma acabaré con la ira de ese maldito xenos y le haré pagar por todas las vidas que se ha llevado!».
languages.original_text: "Such are the consequences of ill-considered actions born out of the lack of faith in the God-Emperor's laws! I am ready to stop the accursed xenos's rampage personally and repay every life he has taken!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Eso es por tomar decisiones apresuradas desconsiderando las leyes del Dios Emperador! ¡Yo misma acabaré con la ira de ese maldito xenos y le haré pagar por todas las vidas que se ha llevado!».
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: 「神帝陛下の秩序への不信から生まれた、思慮の浅い行動が招いた結果だ！私は呪われた異種族の暴挙を自ら阻止し、彼が奪ったすべての命に報いる用意がある！」
languages.original_text: "Such are the consequences of ill-considered actions born out of the lack of faith in the God-Emperor's laws! I am ready to stop the accursed xenos's rampage personally and repay every life he has taken!"

traits.locale_text: 「神帝陛下の秩序への不信から生まれた、思慮の浅い行動が招いた結果だ！私は呪われた異種族の暴挙を自ら阻止し、彼が奪ったすべての命に報いる用意がある！」
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Das sind eindeutig die Folgen von unüberlegten Handlungen, zurückzuführen auf einen mangelnden Glauben an die Gesetze des Gottimperators! Ich werde den Amoklauf dieses verfluchten Xenos persönlich stoppen und jedes von ihm genommene Leben zurückzahlen!"
languages.original_text: "Such are the consequences of ill-considered actions born out of the lack of faith in the God-Emperor's laws! I am ready to stop the accursed xenos's rampage personally and repay every life he has taken!"

traits.locale_text: "Das sind eindeutig die Folgen von unüberlegten Handlungen, zurückzuführen auf einen mangelnden Glauben an die Gesetze des Gottimperators! Ich werde den Amoklauf dieses verfluchten Xenos persönlich stoppen und jedes von ihm genommene Leben zurückzahlen!"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Tanrı İmparator'un kaidelerine itimatsızlıktan doğan düşüncesizce eylemlerin neticesi böyledir! Melun zenonun katliamını bizzat durdurmaya ve aldığı her canın bedelini ödetmeye hazırım!"
languages.original_text: "Such are the consequences of ill-considered actions born out of the lack of faith in the God-Emperor's laws! I am ready to stop the accursed xenos's rampage personally and repay every life he has taken!"
